example.eg: She was too dumb to think of an alternative.
example.egtrans: 她太笨了，想不出别的法子来。

dsense.name: dumb
dsense.guideword: US, informal (thing, idea: stupid) (非正式用语)

example.eg: I'm wasting my time in this dumb class.
example.egtrans: 这种无聊的课，简直就是浪费我的时间。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 愚蠢的, 无聊的, 毫无意义的

dsense.name: dumb
dsense.guideword: dated, now offensive (mute, unable to speak)

example.eg: After the child's fifth birthday passed without a word, the parents realised he was dumb.
example.egtrans: 孩子五岁生日后还是一言不发，父母才意识到他是个哑巴。

example.eg: I was dumb with amazement at what he was saying.
example.egtrans: 对他所说的我一时哑口无言。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一时无语的，一时语塞的, 说不出话的

dsense.name: dumb down
dsense.guideword: informal (present [sth] in less educated way) (非正式用语)

example.eg: The news media these days is dumbing down, with more photos of celebrities than real news stories.
example.egtrans: 近来的新闻媒体正逐步简单化，提供的名人的照片比实际新闻内容还多。

dsense.name: dumb [sth] down
dsense.guideword: informal (present in less educated way) (非正式用语)

example.eg: You may need to dumb down your presentation for this audience.
example.egtrans: 为照顾这群听众，你可能需要将演讲内容简单化。

dsense.name: deaf and dumb
dsense.guideword: dated, offensive (unable to hear, speak) (废弃)

example.eg: The cook placed the food inside the dumb waiter and pressed the button to send it up to the master's study on the second floor.
If you talk to him for a few minutes, you quickly realize that he is just another dumbass.
Stealing from your boss is a really dumbass thing to do.
Doing presses with dumbbells is a great way to strengthen the muscles in your shoulders and upper back.
Phil played dumb when his dad asked him if he knew who had broken the window.
The crowd was struck dumb at the sight of him on the high wire.
